org.opends.server.tools

Class InstallDSArgumentParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ArgumentParser
      • org.opends.server.tools.InstallDSArgumentParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToolRefDocContainer

    public class InstallDSArgumentParser
extends ArgumentParser
    Class used to parse the arguments of the setup command-line and to check that there are not conflicting arguments (nor missing arguments in no prompt mode). Note that this class does not perform checks involving network (like if a given port is free) nor the validity of the certificate information provided.

    • Field Summary

                         throws ArgumentException

      • getConnectTimeout

        public int getConnectTimeout()
                      throws IllegalStateException
        Returns the timeout to be used to connect in milliseconds. The method must be called after parsing the arguments.
        Returns:
        the timeout to be used to connect in milliseconds. Returns 0 if there is no timeout.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the method is called before parsing the arguments.
